Dark One/Breakdown/Pyro/Hiss/Scavenger:



Dark One saw all of his troops approach him.  "I trust you've installed the 
new chips?"

"Yes, Dark One." Breakdown replied.

"Excellent."  Activating his com, Dark One smiled.  <Zardus, Dark One.  I've 
detected multipe signatures and mass weapons fire.  Predacon and Maximal.  I 
am going to "help" our allies>     

"Come, this will be a perfect time to test out our new alternate modes.  
Follow me!" Dark One yelled, running through the base, followed by his 
Oblitercons, all of them heading for the battle.
